title: A Novel Dual Lentiviral CRISPR-based Transcriptional Activation System for  Gene Expression Regulation in Neurons
procedures: First, validate in vitro that a gene-specific sgRNA successfully induces your gene of interest (See Part V).Produce large-scale lentivirus preparations in a T225 for each construct and resuspend in only 30-50 µl sterile 1x DPBS.Titer viruses as described above and dilute sgRNA viruses with 1x sterile DPBS as necessary so that all sgRNAs used in the study are the same titer.Infuse a mixture of the sgRNA and the dCas9-VPR construct into the brain area of interest at a rate of 0.25 µl/min. For our studies, we used a total volume of 1.5 µl, with 0.5 µl of the sgRNA plasmid mixed with 1.0 µl of dCas9-VPR.Expression of the transgenes has been validated in rats 2 weeks after infusion.
